title: Rare font (help needed)
content:
cant figure out this font. Tried diferent sites but no one identified it. Aprreciate any effort

( Its circled in red)  
 [http://www.dafont.com/forum/attach/orig/2/6/267367.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20131016205318/http:/www.dafont.com/forum/attach/orig/2/6/267367.png "http://www.dafont.com/forum/attach/orig/2/6/267367.png")
author: YoungArtist

comments.content:
Is it possible to get a clearer sample?  
Don

It look like it's a bitmap font but:

Try "Ignis et Glacies Extra Sharp" on dafont.com

It's not perfect (you'll have to extent the middle of the W but it's reasonably close.
